sql.if: AND B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_DAY BETWEEN DATE(#{startRegDate}) AND DATE(#{endRegDate})+1

mapper.select: SELECT A.EVENT_BOARD_ID, A.EVENT_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, A.EVENT_BOARD_TITLE, A.EVENT_BOARD_END_DAY, A.EVENT_BOARD_START_DAY, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_ID, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_ROUTE, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_NAME, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_DAY FROM EVENT_BOARD A JOIN EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL B ON (A.EVENT_BOARD_ID = B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_ID) ORDER BY A.EVENT_BOARD_ID DESC

SELECT A.EVENT_BOARD_ID, A.EVENT_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, A.EVENT_BOARD_TITLE, A.EVENT_BOARD_END_DAY, A.EVENT_BOARD_START_DAY, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_ID, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_ROUTE, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_NAME, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_DAY FROM EVENT_BOARD A JOIN EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL B ON (A.EVENT_BOARD_ID = B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_ID) WHERE A.EVENT_BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT_BOARD(EVENT_BOARD_ID, EVENT_BOARD_IMAGE_ROUTE, EVENT_BOARD_IMAGE_NAME, EVENT_BOARD_IMAGE_EXTENTION, EVENT_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, EVENT_BOARD_TITLE, EVENT_BOARD_START_DAY,EVENT_BOARD_END_DAY) VALUES(#{eventBoardId},#{eventBoardImageRoute},#{eventBoardImageName},#{eventBoardImageExtention},0,#{eventBoardTitle},#{eventBoardStartday},#{eventBoardEndday})

INSERT INTO EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL(EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_ID, EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_ROUTE, EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_NAME, EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_EXTENTION, EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_DAY) VALUES(#{eventBoardDetailId},#{eventBoardDetailImageRoute},#{eventBoardDetailImageName},#{eventBoardDetailImageExtention},now())
mapper.select: SELECT A.EVENT_BOARD_ID, A.EVENT_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, A.EVENT_BOARD_TITLE, A.EVENT_BOARD_START_DAY, A.EVENT_BOARD_END_DAY, A.EVENT_BOARD_IMAGE_ROUTE, A.EVENT_BOARD_IMAGE_NAME, A.EVENT_BOARD_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_ID, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_ROUTE, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_NAME, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_EXTENTION, B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_DAY FROM EVENT_BOARD A JOIN EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL B ON (A.EVENT_BOARD_ID = B.EVENT_BOARD_DETAIL_ID) WHERE EVENT_BOARD_ID = #{id}
